title: client horribly optimized, laggy as hell?
body:
i just got this computer, it's quite a capable pc.
when I decided to play league for the first time in 5 months I noticed the client is really, really laggy for some reason.
so laggy that I'm unable to do things in time. like just now, when I somehow dodged a ranked game even though I picked my champ. 
several times it has just frozen and I lose up to 5 seconds of the champ select timer when I need to reconfigure my masteries or summoner spells.
am I the only one who seems to have this problem?

replies.body:
Since you got a new pc, make sure your OS is up to date and has all updated drivers.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help make sure.

You may also need to enable [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode in case your pc is going through too much stress in champion select.  Test it out in a custom to see if it helped!  We can go from there!
I had it before, I just enabled low spec mode in the options and it changed a little bit
